column5: Hooks, check your PM's! Your inbox is full! We might have a trip!
Dave, I'll pm you his email address. He may pick that up sooner. PjShorthorn
Thanks Pat! Just might have a 2018 trip lined up!
It's tough being popular. Thanks Pat, Dave and I connected. How bout dem Irish!

We will be up for the NC State game so maybe we can "hook" up if you are in town. Big family gathering that weekend, on my wife's side, but I'd rather drink a couple of beers on the steps of the AD with you and talk Canada trips. The family won't miss me.....lol. PjShorthorn
absolutely. You still have my phone number? Otherwise communicate through email when you are available. I won't be on campus for the game, but we can hit a watering hole or something.
You bet !!!! I'll give you a jingle as soon as I can figure out all the other " important " logistical details.......according to the boss. PjShorthorn
